panels.description: Accurate TVL with duplicates subtracted. The ones below are simple sums

targets.expr: sum(yearn{param="tvl"}) + avg(yearn{param="vecrv balance"}) * avg(yearn{param="crv price"}) + sum(yearn_vault{param="tvl"}) + sum(iearn{param="tvl"}) + sum(ironbank{param="tvl"}) - sum(yearn{param="tvl",vault=~"curve.fi/(y|busd)"})

panels.title: TVL

title: Total Value Locked in the Yearn Ecosystem
